item.title: Overview of Parametric Human Body Models
item.description: Problem with anthropometric data see: CAESAR and ANSUR II They all need to be licensed A good start to this would be check out the SMPL* body models first they have provided starter code for use with neural network libraries such as tensorflow/pytorch This blog post describes how to use the code related to these models Overview of SMPL* models and methods This is from one of their youtube videos :
